caption: What I like most about backend development is its diversity. I am a big fan of optimizing to the last nanosecond in low level languages, but sometimes an express app is just what is needed. I enjoy doing both.
Mobile development was one of the first things I got into. Objective-C/Swift and UIKit/Cocoa were the begin of my journey back in 2015.
I work on the web since 2018 and I am very exited to see how it will evolve.
